headline.main: POLITICAL COMMISSARS AID RED ARMY; They Keep Watch on Morale in Russian And Enemy Ranks

lead_paragraph: KUIBYSHEV, May 2 -- If the democracies owe a debt to the Red Army, a large part is due to those conscientious, clear-sighted and soldierly men, the political commissars.
abstract: pol commissars role in aiding USSR Army discussed
snippet: KUIBYSHEV, May 2 -- If the democracies owe a debt to the Red Army, a large part is due to those conscientious, clear-sighted and soldierly men, the political commissars....

byline.original: By RALPH PARKERWireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
